channel.title: Pages on Any Means Necessary
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Any Means Necessary

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! My name is Jeremy Peach, and I’m a data scientist. For my day job, I work as a Cloud Solution Architect at Microsoft where I help customers with cloud-scale data science. In my spare time, I apply those same skills to satisfy my own personal curiosity. This blog gives me a platform to share these personal data analyses with the rest of the world. Most will be frivilous, but some may be serious.
